name: Cave Copter (demo)
description:
Your Friend has been lost in the cave. You must find him!

Cave Copter (demo) is simple adventure game boy style game with 5 levels where you must collect your friend and back into landing floor.  Try not crash your machine on the walls.

Controls:

A - interaction/menu enter

B - copter engine

arrows - direction (left/right)

Enjoy and have fun!
